projects.descriptionEn: A stunning modern wooden kitchen featuring clean lines and smart details. The design emphasizes simplicity with high functionality, perfect for contemporary lifestyle.
projects.descriptionAr: مطبخ خشبي عصري مذهل يتميز بخطوط نظيفة وتفاصيل ذكية. التصميم يركز على البساطة مع وظائف عالية، مثالي لأسلوب الحياة العصري.
projects.challengesEn: Maximizing storage in a compact space while maintaining aesthetic appeal.
projects.challengesAr: تعظيم التخزين في مساحة مدمجة مع الحفاظ على الجاذبية الجمالية.

projects.descriptionEn: An elegant classic wooden kitchen that captures timeless beauty with luxurious details expressing sophistication and warmth.
projects.descriptionAr: مطبخ خشبي كلاسيكي أنيق يلتقط الجمال الخالد مع تفاصيل فاخرة تعبر عن الرقي والدفء.
projects.challengesEn: Blending traditional aesthetics with modern functionality.
projects.challengesAr: مزج الجماليات التقليدية مع الوظائف الحديثة.

projects.descriptionEn: A practical lasting solution with weather-resistant design options that deliver beauty without maintenance.
projects.descriptionAr: حل عملي يدوم مع خيارات تصميم مقاومة للعوامل تمنحك جمالاً بلا صيانة.
projects.challengesEn: Creating a sleek modern look while ensuring durability in humid conditions.
projects.challengesAr: إنشاء مظهر عصري أنيق مع ضمان المتانة في الظروف الرطبة.

projects.descriptionEn: Spaces that reflect your style with smart organization giving every piece its place for an easier start every day.
projects.descriptionAr: مساحات تعكس أسلوبك مع تنظيم ذكي يمنح كل قطعة مكانها لبداية أسهل كل يوم.
projects.challengesEn: Maximizing wardrobe space while creating a luxurious ambiance.
projects.challengesAr: تعظيم مساحة الخزانة مع خلق جو فاخر.

testimonials.name: Sheikh Mohammed Al-Rashid
testimonials.title: Private Palace Owner
testimonials.quote: Kitchen Core transformed our palace kitchen into a culinary masterpiece. The attention to detail and quality of craftsmanship is unparalleled. Every element speaks of luxury and functionality.
testimonials.quoteEn: Kitchen Core transformed our palace kitchen into a culinary masterpiece. The attention to detail and quality of craftsmanship is unparalleled. Every element speaks of luxury and functionality.
testimonials.quoteAr: Kitchen Core transformed our palace kitchen into a culinary masterpiece. The attention to detail and quality of craftsmanship is unparalleled. Every element speaks of luxury and functionality.

testimonials.name: Isabella Rossi
testimonials.title: Villa Owner
testimonials.quote: Working with Kitchen Core was an absolute pleasure. They understood our vision for a Mediterranean villa kitchen and exceeded every expectation. The Italian marble selection and smart technology integration is flawless.
testimonials.quoteEn: Working with Kitchen Core was an absolute pleasure. They understood our vision for a Mediterranean villa kitchen and exceeded every expectation. The Italian marble selection and smart technology integration is flawless.
testimonials.quoteAr: Working with Kitchen Core was an absolute pleasure. They understood our vision for a Mediterranean villa kitchen and exceeded every expectation. The Italian marble selection and smart technology integration is flawless.

testimonials.name: Alexander Chen
testimonials.title: Private Estate Owner
testimonials.quote: From concept to completion, Kitchen Core delivered exceptional service. Our estate kitchen now features the finest European appliances and custom cabinetry. It's a perfect blend of tradition and innovation.
testimonials.quoteEn: From concept to completion, Kitchen Core delivered exceptional service. Our estate kitchen now features the finest European appliances and custom cabinetry. It's a perfect blend of tradition and innovation.
testimonials.quoteAr: From concept to completion, Kitchen Core delivered exceptional service. Our estate kitchen now features the finest European appliances and custom cabinetry. It's a perfect blend of tradition and innovation.

testimonials.name: Fatima Al-Saud
testimonials.title: Heritage Palace
testimonials.quote: Kitchen Core respected our heritage while bringing modern culinary excellence to our palace. The team's professionalism and expertise in luxury fit-out is remarkable. Highly recommended for discerning clients.
testimonials.quoteEn: Kitchen Core respected our heritage while bringing modern culinary excellence to our palace. The team's professionalism and expertise in luxury fit-out is remarkable. Highly recommended for discerning clients.
testimonials.quoteAr: Kitchen Core respected our heritage while bringing modern culinary excellence to our palace. The team's professionalism and expertise in luxury fit-out is remarkable. Highly recommended for discerning clients.

processSteps.title: Discovery & Consultation
processSteps.description: We begin with an in-depth consultation to understand your vision, lifestyle, and requirements. Our design team visits your property to assess space and architectural considerations.
processSteps.descriptionEn: We begin with an in-depth consultation to understand your vision, lifestyle, and requirements. Our design team visits your property to assess space and architectural considerations.
processSteps.descriptionAr: We begin with an in-depth consultation to understand your vision, lifestyle, and requirements. Our design team visits your property to assess space and architectural considerations.

processSteps.title: Design & Planning
processSteps.description: Our architects create detailed 3D renderings and technical drawings. We curate premium materials, appliances, and finishes tailored to your aesthetic preferences and functional needs.
processSteps.descriptionEn: Our architects create detailed 3D renderings and technical drawings. We curate premium materials, appliances, and finishes tailored to your aesthetic preferences and functional needs.
processSteps.descriptionAr: Our architects create detailed 3D renderings and technical drawings. We curate premium materials, appliances, and finishes tailored to your aesthetic preferences and functional needs.

processSteps.title: Approval & Refinement
processSteps.description: We present comprehensive design proposals and walk you through every detail. Revisions are made until the design perfectly aligns with your expectations and specifications.
processSteps.descriptionEn: We present comprehensive design proposals and walk you through every detail. Revisions are made until the design perfectly aligns with your expectations and specifications.
processSteps.descriptionAr: We present comprehensive design proposals and walk you through every detail. Revisions are made until the design perfectly aligns with your expectations and specifications.

processSteps.title: Fabrication & Sourcing
processSteps.description: Custom cabinetry is handcrafted in Italy. Premium materials are sourced from trusted suppliers worldwide. Every component is inspected for quality before shipment.
processSteps.descriptionEn: Custom cabinetry is handcrafted in Italy. Premium materials are sourced from trusted suppliers worldwide. Every component is inspected for quality before shipment.
processSteps.descriptionAr: Custom cabinetry is handcrafted in Italy. Premium materials are sourced from trusted suppliers worldwide. Every component is inspected for quality before shipment.

processSteps.title: Installation & Fit-Out
processSteps.description: Our expert craftsmen handle precise installation with meticulous attention to detail. Plumbing, electrical, and ventilation systems are seamlessly integrated.
processSteps.descriptionEn: Our expert craftsmen handle precise installation with meticulous attention to detail. Plumbing, electrical, and ventilation systems are seamlessly integrated.
processSteps.descriptionAr: Our expert craftsmen handle precise installation with meticulous attention to detail. Plumbing, electrical, and ventilation systems are seamlessly integrated.

processSteps.title: Final Touches & Handover
processSteps.description: Final inspections ensure perfection. Your team receives comprehensive training on all appliances and smart systems. We provide ongoing support and maintenance services.
processSteps.descriptionEn: Final inspections ensure perfection. Your team receives comprehensive training on all appliances and smart systems. We provide ongoing support and maintenance services.
processSteps.descriptionAr: Final inspections ensure perfection. Your team receives comprehensive training on all appliances and smart systems. We provide ongoing support and maintenance services.

services.title: Palace Kitchen Design
services.description: Bespoke kitchen architecture for palatial residences combining classical grandeur with modern culinary technology.
services.descriptionEn: Bespoke kitchen architecture for palatial residences combining classical grandeur with modern culinary technology.
services.descriptionAr: Bespoke kitchen architecture for palatial residences combining classical grandeur with modern culinary technology.

services.title: Villa Kitchen Fit-Out
services.description: Complete kitchen solutions for luxury villas featuring handcrafted details and state-of-the-art equipment.
services.descriptionEn: Complete kitchen solutions for luxury villas featuring handcrafted details and state-of-the-art equipment.
services.descriptionAr: Complete kitchen solutions for luxury villas featuring handcrafted details and state-of-the-art equipment.

services.title: Estate Kitchen Systems
services.description: Holistic kitchen design for private estates with butler's pantries, prep kitchens, and entertaining spaces.
services.descriptionEn: Holistic kitchen design for private estates with butler's pantries, prep kitchens, and entertaining spaces.
services.descriptionAr: Holistic kitchen design for private estates with butler's pantries, prep kitchens, and entertaining spaces.

company.descriptionEn: For over fifteen years, we've been transforming ideas into exceptional spaces — we listen, understand, and design beyond expectations.
company.descriptionAr: منذ أكثر من خمسة عشر عاماً، نحوّل الأفكار إلى مساحات استثنائية — نستمع، نفهم، ونصمم بما يتجاوز التوقعات.
company.missionEn: We listen to your vision, understand your challenges, and create design solutions that fit your space and lifestyle — every project is unique, every detail is thoughtful.
company.missionAr: نستمع لرؤيتك، نفهم تحدياتك، ونبتكر حلولاً تصميمية تناسب مساحتك وأسلوب حياتك — كل مشروع فريد، كل تفصيلة مدروسة.
company.visionEn: To be the first choice for those seeking innovative design and professional execution — we build long-term relationships with our clients through quality, commitment, and creativity.
company.visionAr: أن نكون الخيار الأول لمن يبحث عن تصميم مبتكر وتنفيذ احترافي — نبني علاقات طويلة الأمد مع عملائنا من خلال الجودة والالتزام والإبداع.

teamMembers.bioEn: With over 15 years of experience in luxury kitchen design and fit-out, Eng. Esam Odeh has established Kitchen Core as the premier choice for discerning clients. His vision combines traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to create culinary spaces that are both timeless and innovative.
teamMembers.bioAr: مع أكثر من 15 عاماً من الخبرة في تصميم وتركيب المطابخ الفاخرة، أسس م. عصام عودة كيتشن كور كخيار أول للعملاء المميزين. تجمع رؤيته بين الحرفية التقليدية والتكنولوجيا المتطورة لإنشاء مساحات طهي خالدة ومبتكرة.

teamMembers.bioEn: Sarah brings a fresh perspective to luxury kitchen design with her background in European architecture and interior design. She specializes in creating harmonious spaces that balance aesthetics with functionality.
teamMembers.bioAr: تجلب سارة منظوراً جديداً لتصميم المطابخ الفاخرة بخلفيتها في الهندسة المعمارية الأوروبية والتصميم الداخلي. تتخصص في إنشاء مساحات متناغمة توازن بين الجماليات والوظيفة.

teamMembers.bioEn: A third-generation Italian craftsman, Marco oversees all custom cabinetry and millwork. His expertise in traditional woodworking techniques ensures every Kitchen Core project meets the highest standards of quality.
teamMembers.bioAr: حرفي إيطالي من الجيل الثالث، يشرف ماركو على جميع الخزائن والنجارة المخصصة. خبرته في تقنيات النجارة التقليدية تضمن أن كل مشروع من مشاريع كيتشن كور يلبي أعلى معايير الجودة.

teamMembers.bioEn: Ahmed leads our technical team, ensuring seamless integration of smart home systems, ventilation, plumbing, and electrical infrastructure in every kitchen project. His engineering expertise is crucial to our success.
teamMembers.bioAr: يقود أحمد فريقنا الفني، مما يضمن التكامل السلس لأنظمة المنزل الذكي والتهوية والسباكة والبنية التحتية الكهربائية في كل مشروع مطبخ. خبرته الهندسية حاسمة لنجاحنا.

teamMembers.bioEn: Elena coordinates all aspects of Kitchen Core projects from initial consultation to final handover. Her exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail ensure every project is delivered on time and exceeds expectations.
teamMembers.bioAr: تنسق إيلينا جميع جوانب مشاريع كيتشن كور من الاستشارة الأولية إلى التسليم النهائي. مهاراتها التنظيمية الاستثنائية واهتمامها بالتفاصيل يضمنان تسليم كل مشروع في الوقت المحدد وتجاوز التوقعات.

siteSettings.siteTitle: Kitchen Core - Luxury Kitchen Design & Fit-Out
siteSettings.heroSubheading: Bespoke kitchen design and fit-out for palaces, villas, and luxury estates. Where Italian craftsmanship meets cutting-edge technology.
siteSettings.showroomAddress:
By appointment only
Dubai Design District
siteSettings.seoDescription: Kitchen Core specializes in luxury kitchen design and fit-out for palaces, villas, and estates. Combining Italian craftsmanship with smart technology for discerning clients worldwide.
